articles.description: Stephen Colbert told Trump "Go f--- yourself" after the president had said 'I absolutely love that Colbert was fired.'
articles.content:
Stephen Colbert had a succinct message to President Trump, one that involved an anatomical impossibility.

articles.title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner, star of The Cosby Show, dies aged 54 - BBC
articles.description: The Grammy-winning actor drowned on Sunday while on vacation in Costa Rica, investigators say.
articles.content:
Kwasi Gyamfi Asiedu and Max Matza
Malcolm-Jamal Warner, an actor best known for his role as Theo Huxtable on The Cosby Show, has died.
Warner, who was 54, drowned at the weekend while on holiday in… [+4134 chars]

articles.description: "The spotlight has been unusual and surreal for our team and, while I would never have wished for it to happen like this, Astronomer is now a household name,” said cofounder Pete DeJoy.
